AI写作是聊天，寻找文献会根据输入的主题词去寻找对应论文: Click AI Write for normal conversation, click Thesis2AI to find corresponding Thesiss based on the input topic
论文来源: Select the source of the Thesis
时间范围: Range of literature release dates, from this time to this year
更新文中的上标，使得数字顺序排列: Update the superscript in the text to make the numbers in order
Buy VIP TO UNLOCK Cloud Sync and Edit Mu: Buy VIP TO UNLOCK Cloud Sync and Edit Mutiple Thesiss Simultaneously
Title: Title
Author: Author

configurations.cocopilot-gpt4: cocopilot-gpt4 (apiKey prefix with ghu, as GitHub does not allow uploading complete keys)
configurations.deepseek-chat: deepseek-chat (Model needs to be manually changed to this one)

鼠标点击段落中的上标跳转到文献引用？: Click the superscript in the paragraph to jump to the reference?
是否检查文献与主题相关性(如果不相关则不会传给AI引用): Check the relevance of the literature to the topic (if it is not relevant, it will not be passed to the AI reference)
